did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Circuit court receipts from 1875-1882 for Rockingham County, Virginia.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of Item], The Rockingham County Circuit Court Receipts, 1875-1882, SC# 3086, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Deposited by Scott Suter for the Harrisonburg-Rockingham Historical Society in January 1996.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: These documents show court fees for Rockingham County, Virginia during the late 1870s and early 1880s.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Rockingham County Circuit Court Receipts collection contains 4.5 inches of receipts from the Clerk of the Circuit Court, Rockingham County, VA, for payment of "order and continuance" and other court fees, 1875-1882. These documents came in alphabetically-designated pockets in a cloth apron designed for the purpose.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Receipts are enclosed in six sleeves within the box
